variables.description: Indicates whether the trail is publishing events from global services, such as             IAM, to the log files.
variables.name: IncludeGlobalServiceEvents

variables.description: Indicates whether the CloudTrail trail is currently logging AWS API calls.
variables.name: IsLogging

variables.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where CloudTrail publishes log files.
variables.name: S3BucketName

variables.description: An Amazon S3 object key prefix that precedes the name of all log files.
variables.name: S3KeyPrefix

variables.description: The name of an Amazon SNS topic that is notified when new log files are                   published.
variables.name: SnsTopicName
